promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young basic bison normal-type pokemon wearing a golden mask. It can be found in field-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or bison. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Maskalow, a a chibi young basic bison normal-type pokemon. It can be found in field-like environments It has the following abilities: Double Chop, Plant Cloak Tackle. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bison", "normal" or "Maskalow". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, bison-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, faded prismatic bokeh background
generatedDescription: This tiny pasture dweller, Maskalow, enjoys basking in sunlight. With a Double Chop or Plant Cloak Tackle, it gently grazes on life.
